name: ztnet
tagline: A management UI for ZeroTier networks
description: ztnet is a self-hosted controller and management UI for ZeroTier networks. It lets administrators manage networks, members, and access rules via a central, easy-to-use web dashboard.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Create and configure ZeroTier networks with custom IP ranges and routing rules from a web

features.title: Member Authorization
features.description: Approve or deny device join requests and manage which devices can access each network

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create accounts for team members with permissions to manage specific networks or view-only access

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Add descriptions and tags to network members for easier identification and organization
